meanings.definition: To be covered in saliva or mucus.
meanings.sent1: The baby was bedriveled after drooling all over his bib.
meanings.sent2: She bedriveled her shirt while sneezing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent3: The puppy bedriveled the floor with its wet kisses.
meanings.sent4: The window was bedriveled with raindrops during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The chef bedriveled the dish with a drizzle of sauce.

meanings.definition: To be tearful or emotionally affected.
meanings.sent1: He bedriveled when he heard the sad news.
meanings.sent2: She bedriveled during the touching movie scene.
meanings.sent3: The clown's bedriveled face made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was bedriveled with sorrow after the breakup.
meanings.sent5: The farewell speech left the audience bedriveled with emotion.

meanings.sent1: The wind bedriveled her hair as she walked along the beach.
meanings.sent2: The room was bedriveled with scattered papers and books.
meanings.sent3: His bedriveled appearance raised eyebrows at the formal event.
meanings.sent4: The garden was bedriveled after the storm passed through.
meanings.sent5: The artist's studio was bedriveled with paint splatters and brushes.
